研究人员确定脑电路以减轻焦虑而没有副作用Weill Cornell医学研究者在临床前模型中确定了特定的大脑回路，其抑制作用似乎减轻了焦虑而没有副作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/researchers-isendify-sideify-brain-circuit-to-reduce--reduce-anxiety-anciety-without-without-side-effects.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/researchers-isendify-nistify-brain-circuit-to-reduce-to-reduce-anxiety-anciety-without-without-side-effects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b152680f-a9ba-4d81-a153-9d8cd9061dda Tue, 28 Jan 2025 23:15:29 -0500 Researchers identify brain circuit to reduce anxiety without side effects
科学家发现具有再生医学潜力的新骨骼组织一支全球科学家团队对新的骨骼组织进行了突破性的发现，称为“ lipocar​​tilage”，为再生医学和组织工程提供了巨大的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/scientists-discover-new-new-skeletal-tissue-with-potential-for-for-regenerative-medicine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/scientists-discover-new-skeletal-tissue-with-potential-for-for-for-reenerative-medicine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=21994328-BBDA-4BD6-8C36-AAD213E33E33F8F Tue, 28 Jan 2025 23:04:10 -0500 Scientists discover new skeletal tissue with potential for regenerative medicine

AI技术发现帕金森氏症的遗传因素和治疗选择来自克利夫兰诊所基因组中心的研究人员已成功将高级人工智能（AI）遗传学模型应用于帕金森氏病。研究人员确定了可能重新用于PD治疗的进展和FDA批准药物中的遗传因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/ai-technology-uncovers-genetic-factors-and-warcors-and-wareatment-wareatment-options-for-parkinsons.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/ai-technology-uncovers-genetic-factors-factors-and-wareatment-wareatment-poptions-for-parkinsons.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9fa3d133-77c5-4848-8CA4-8CA4-5CDA5FAB5B17 Tue, 28 Jan 2025 21:47:42 -0500 AI technology uncovers genetic factors and treatment options for Parkinson's
遗传基因突变发现增加了前列腺癌的风险对有前列腺癌家族史的男性的研究发现了一种遗传的前列腺癌形式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/inherited-gene-moint-found-found-to-incrase-prostate-prostate-cancer-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/inherited-gene-moint-found-found-to-incrase-prostate-prostate-cancer-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=AE1424E0-F716-4C89-B950-481841103DD55 Tue, 28 Jan 2025 21:42:34 -0500 Inherited gene mutation found to increase prostate cancer risk
研究表明，初级保健提供者与医院和私募股权的隶属关系增加棕色大学公共卫生学院的研究人员的一项研究表明，美国所有初级保健提供者（PCP）中有将近一半隶属于医院，而私募股权公司隶属的PCP数量正在增长并集中在某些地区市场。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/study-reveals-rising-afrising-afrisiation-farmary-care-providers-with-hospitals-private-equity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/study-reveals-rising-rising-afrisiation-farmary-care-providers-primary-care-providers-hospitals-private-equity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f1E9945B-3707-48C7-A001-A001-133437929FCF Tue, 28 Jan 2025 21:34:23 -0500 Study reveals rising affiliation of primary care providers with hospitals and private equity
开创性研究揭示了与食物耐受性有关的关键肠道细胞我们服用的每一口食物，我们的肠道免疫系统必须做出重大决定。这些精致敏感的细胞以捍卫我们免受异物病原体的侵害，以某种方式将朋友与破坏敌人的入侵者区分开来，同时耐受食物和有用的细菌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/groundBreaking-Research-reveals-key-gut-gut-cells-cells-involved-involved-involved-in-food-tolerance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/groundBreaking-Research-reveals-key-gut-gut-cells-cells-involved-involved-in-folved-in-food-tolerance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=844fce29-D51D-4484-A478-CC2F1B45F4CA Tue, 28 Jan 2025 21:30:07 -0500 Groundbreaking research reveals key gut cells involved in food tolerance
第4阶段乳腺癌中无症状的脑转移需要重新评估筛查指南莫菲特癌症中心研究人员领导的一项新研究表明，在4期乳腺癌患者中，无症状的脑转移比以前认为的更为常见。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/asmpompastic-brain-metastasis-in-stage-4-breast-cancer-cancer-requires-requires-requires-requirevaluation-screening-guidelines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/asmptomatic-brain-brain-metastasis-in-stage-4-breast-cancer-cancer-requires-requires-requires-requires-requires-requirevaluation-screening-guidelines.aspx#Comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=AB322110-36FE-4394-84B5-DE218490C1D0 Tue, 28 Jan 2025 21:20:24 -0500 Asymptomatic brain metastasis in stage 4 breast cancer requires reevaluation of screening guidelines
研究表明，长期大麻使用干扰关键的大脑过程大量大麻的使用与关键认知区域的大脑激活减少有关，尤其是在工作记忆任务期间，而最近的使用可能会导致暂时的认知障碍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/study-shows-nows-long-term-cannabis-use-disrupts-critical-critical-brain-processes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/study-shows-nows-long-term-cannabis-use-disrupts-critical-critical-brain-processes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=48f14344-5329-45A8-96B6-D611E311E309779E Tue, 28 Jan 2025 20:27:00 -0500 Study shows long-term cannabis use disrupts critical brain processes
